hero.subtitle1: Hundreds of routes from verified drivers.
hero.subtitle2: Pick your fare and travel with confidence.

1.title: Flexible pricing
1.text: Drivers set their own trip price, and you choose the best option based on price, car model, or rating.

2.title: Reliable drivers
2.text: Every driver is verified, has reviews, a rating, and a confirmed personal profile.

3.title: Exact pickup and drop-off
3.text: The driver will pick you up at the agreed location and drop you off exactly where you arranged.

steps.title: Enter search details
steps.desc: Specify departure and destination cities, as well as your travel date.

steps.title: Choose a suitable route or driver
steps.desc: Browse available offers and pick the option that best fits your time and budget.

steps.title: Book your seat
steps.desc: Confirm the booking and wait for the driver's approval.

steps.title: The driver will contact you. Have a safe trip!
steps.desc: After approval, the driver will reach out to clarify trip details.

download.title: Download our free app
download.subtitle: This makes booking easier and allows you to receive notifications about driver offers.
